output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(bomrang)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(shiny)
})
```


```{r}
melbourne_weather = get_current_weather("Melbourne")

melbourne_weather %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = local_date_time_full,
             y = apparent_t)) +
  geom_path() +
  labs(x = "Time", 
       y = "Apparent Temp (Celcius)")
```


```{r}
inputPanel(
  shiny::textInput(inputId = "location",
                   label = "Put a location here!",
                   value = "Hobart")
)

renderPlot({
  weather = get_current_weather(input$location)
  
  weather %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = local_date_time_full,
               y = apparent_t)) +
    geom_path() +
    labs(x = "Time", 
         y = "Apparent Temp (Celcius)")
})
```
